articles.title: Scientists have revived a 'zombie' virus that spent 48,500 years frozen in permafrost - CNN
articles.description: Warmer temperatures in the Arctic are thawing the region's permafrost — a frozen layer of soil beneath the ground — and potentially stirring viruses that, after lying dormant for tens of thousands of years, could endanger animal and human health.
